import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { Row, Col, Button, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) // const submitHandler = (e) => { // e.preventDefault() // // Dispatch // history.push('/payment') // } return ( <>

Address : {cart.shippingAddress.address},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.city},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}

Method: {' '}{cart.paymentMethod}

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}
